price: 85. et que Nous sommes plus proches (du mourant) que vous ne l’êtes, mais vous ne le voyez pas,
arabic: وَنَحۡنُ أَقۡرَبُ إِلَيۡهِ مِنكُمۡ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wanaḥnu aqrabu ilayhi minkum walākin lā tub'ṣirūna
